dashboard.label: ICS-CERT ADVISORY DASHBOARD

"}},"viz_u8HoHMWn":{"type":"splunk.singlevalue","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_EBTn8dl0_ds_ICS_CERT_ADVISORIES_count"},"title":"VENDORS","options":{"backgroundColor":"#5c6773","majorColor":"#ffffff","trendColor":"#ffffff"},"description":""},"viz_lSfmBfz8":{"type":"splunk.singlevalue","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_GgeQxN9W_ds_EBTn8dl0_ds_ICS_CERT_ADVISORIES_count"},"title":"PRODUCTS","options":{"backgroundColor":"#5c6773","majorColor":"#ffffff","trendColor":"#ffffff"},"description":""}},"dataSources":{"ds_ICS_CERT_ADVISORIES_count":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"|inputlookup ics_cert_project_lookup 
| addinfo
| eval _time=strptime(Original_Release_Date,"%m/%d/%Y")
| where _time>=info_min_time and _time<info_max_time
| stats dc(ICS-CERT_Number)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr_trp.earliest$","latest":"$tr_trp.latest$"}},"name":"ICS_CERT_ADVISORIES_count"},"ds_advisories_by_country":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"|inputlookup ics_cert_project_lookup where Company_Headquarters IN ($ms_vendor_hq_location$)
| addinfo
| eval _time=strptime(Original_Release_Date,"%m/%d/%Y")
| where _time>=info_min_time and _time<info_max_time
| stats count by Company_Headquarters","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr_trp.earliest$","latest":"$tr_trp.latest$"}},"name":"advisories_by_country"},"ds_populate_locations":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| inputlookup ics_cert_project_lookup 
| eval Company_Headquarters_quotes="\"".Company_Headquarters."\""
| stats values(Company_Headquarters_quotes) as Country by Company_Headquarters
| mvexpand Country","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"}},"name":"populate_locations"},"ds_advisories_chart":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| inputlookup ics_cert_project_lookup where Company_Headquarters IN ($ms_vendor_hq_location$) AND Vendor IN ($ms_search_by_vendor$) AND (ICS-CERT_Number="*$text_search_by_ics_cert_number$*" OR "$text_search_by_ics_cert_number$"=="Enter a value")
| addinfo
| eval _time=strptime(Original_Release_Date,"%m/%d/%Y")
| where _time>=info_min_time and _time<info_max_time
| strcat "https://www.cisa.gov/uscert/ics/advisories/" ICS-CERT_Number ics_cert_link
| eval Original_Release_Date=strftime(strptime(Original_Release_Date,"%m/%d/%Y"),"%B %d,%Y")
| rename ICS-CERT_Number as "ICS-CERT Number", Original_Release_Date as "Original Release Date", ICS-CERT_Advisory_Title as "ICS-CERT Advisory Title", ics_cert_link as "Link to CISA ICS-CERT Advisory" 
| streamstats count as "#"
| table "#" "ICS-CERT Number" "Original Release Date" "ICS-CERT Advisory Title" "Link to CISA ICS-CERT Advisory"","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr_trp.earliest$","latest":"$tr_trp.latest$"}},"name":"advisories_chart"},"ds_vendors_by_state":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr_trp.earliest$","latest":"$tr_trp.latest$"},"query":"| inputlookup ics_cert_project_lookup where Company_Headquarters IN ($ms_vendor_hq_location$)
| addinfo
| eval _time=strptime(Original_Release_Date,"%m/%d/%Y")
| where _time>=info_min_time and _time<info_max_time
| stats count by Company_Headquarters | rename Company_Headquarters as "Vendor HQ", count as "# per Vendor""},"name":"vendors_by_state"},"ds_populate_vendors":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| inputlookup ics_cert_project_lookup 
| eval Vendor_quotes="\"".Vendor."\""
| stats values(Vendor_quotes) as Vendor_quotes by Vendor
| mvexpand Vendor","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"}},"name":"populate_vendors"},"ds_EBTn8dl0_ds_ICS_CERT_ADVISORIES_count":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"|inputlookup ics_cert_project_lookup 
| addinfo
| eval _time=strptime(Original_Release_Date,"%m/%d/%Y")
| where _time>=info_min_time and _time<info_max_time
| stats dc(Vendor)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr_trp.earliest$","latest":"$tr_trp.latest$"}},"name":"vendors_count"},"ds_GgeQxN9W_ds_EBTn8dl0_ds_ICS_CERT_ADVISORIES_count":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"|inputlookup ics_cert_project_lookup 
| addinfo
| eval _time=strptime(Original_Release_Date,"%m/%d/%Y")
| where _time>=info_min_time and _time<info_max_time
| stats dc(Product)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$tr_trp.earliest$","latest":"$tr_trp.latest$"}},"name":"products_count"},"ds_populate_products":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| inputlookup ics_cert_project_lookup 
| eval Product_quotes="\"".Product."\""
| stats values(Product_quotes) as Product_quotes by Product
| mvexpand Product","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"}},"name":"populate_products"}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{"latest":"$global_time.latest$","earliest":"$global_time.earliest$"}}}}},"inputs":{"input_vendor_hq_location":{"options":{"items":">frame(label, value) | prepend(formattedStatics) | objects()","token":"ms_vendor_hq_location"},"title":"Vendor HQ Location","type":"input.multiselect","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_populate_locations"},"context":{"formattedConfig":{"number":{"prefix":""}},"formattedStatics":">statics | formatByType(formattedConfig)","statics":[],"label":">primary | seriesByName("Company_Headquarters") | renameSeries("label") | formatByType(formattedConfig)","value":">primary | seriesByName("Country") | renameSeries("value") | formatByType(formattedConfig)"}},"input_search_by_vendor":{"options":{"items":">frame(label, value) | prepend(formattedStatics) | objects()","token":"ms_search_by_vendor"},"title":"Search by Vendor","type":"input.multiselect","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_populate_vendors"},"context":{"formattedConfig":{"number":{"prefix":""}},"formattedStatics":">statics | formatByType(formattedConfig)","statics":[],"label":">primary | seriesByName("Vendor") | renameSeries("label") | formatByType(formattedConfig)","value":">primary | seriesByName("Vendor_quotes") | renameSeries("value") | formatByType(formattedConfig)"}},"input_search_by_ics_cert_number":{"options":{"defaultValue":"Enter a value","token":"text_search_by_ics_cert_number"},"title":"Search by ICS-CERT #","type":"input.text"},"input_trp":{"options":{"defaultValue":"-1y@y,now","token":"tr_trp"},"title":"Select date range","type":"input.timerange"},"input_search_by_product":{"options":{"items":">frame(label, value) | prepend(formattedStatics) | objects()","token":"ms_search_by_product"},"title":"Search by Product","type":"input.multiselect","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_populate_products"},"context":{"formattedConfig":{"number":{"prefix":""}},"formattedStatics":">statics | formatByType(formattedConfig)","statics":[],"label":">primary | seriesByName("Product") | renameSeries("label") | formatByType(formattedConfig)","value":">primary | seriesByName("Product_quotes") | renameSeries("value") | formatByType(formattedConfig)"}}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"backgroundColor":"#202124","width":2400,"display":"auto-scale","height":1200},"structure":[{"item":"viz_map_background","type":"block","position":{"x":1570,"y":160,"w":800,"h":520}},{"item":"viz_zsWvmcNC","type":"block","position":{"x":1890,"y":730,"w":480,"h":120}},{"item":"viz_J6PfWLOS","type":"block","position":{"x":1590,"y":180,"w":760,"h":480}},{"item":"viz_KY3i1CeE","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":20,"w":1520,"h":1160}},{"item":"viz_jfoGSAMd","type":"block","position":{"x":1570,"y":720,"w":290,"h":460}},{"item":"viz_Se66A4XT","type":"block","position":{"x":1950,"y":10,"w":420,"h":140}},{"item":"viz_PCYfBqfo","type":"block","position":{"x":1890,"y":40,"w":70,"h":70}},{"item":"viz_u8HoHMWn","type":"block","position":{"x":1890,"y":890,"w":480,"h":120}},{"item":"viz_lSfmBfz8","type":"block","position":{"x":1890,"y":1050,"w":480,"h":120}}],"globalInputs":["input_vendor_hq_location","input_search_by_vendor","input_search_by_product","input_search_by_ics_cert_number","input_trp"]},"description":"","title":"ICS-CERT ADVISORY DASHBOARD"}
